reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: 1. Project: 10781 SOCO office PMER support for the Country Programme 2. Project area and Country: Somalia + Somaliland3. Project justification: Somalia Country Programme remains focused on both humanitarian and development work. MFA?s support is fundamenta l for the presence of FCA in both Somalia and Somaliland and the achievement of the planned goals. While we continue to respond to the humanitarian needs in Somaliland, new activities aimed at strengthening economic sustainability and supporting long-term development will also be initiated there. Our humanitarian work will expand to target drought-affected Baidoa in South West State, with a focus on Education in Emergencies. FCA and partners will keep working with the Federal Member States (FMS) in support of local district council formation in Jubbaland, South West State, Galmudug and Hirshabelle. FCA Somalia works towards a constantly improved accountable and efficient programme, contributing to state building, good governance, the rule of law and deliveri ng high quality services to the Somali population in a transparent fashion.4. The main objective and expected results:The main objective is to improve effectiveness, quality, and impact of the Country Programme through established field presence. This will be achieved through strategic and operational planning of the Country Programme, monitoring and evaluation of the country programme and projects Implemented, capacity building of local partners, dialogue with authorities and various local actors and netwo rking on both country and regional level. Increased funding diversity, coordination with other aid organisation and increased input of partner organisations from the region into the lobby and advocacy work will also contribute to the realisation of the mai n objective. An increasing number of projects are self-implemented and emphasis will be on the resourcing and staffing of the Country Office. The management and administration of the Country Office will be strengthened and the safety and security of FCA an d our partner staff ensured.5. Right-holders/ beneficiaries: FCA Staff, Local Partners' Staff, Women Groups, YouthDuty bearers: Federal Government of Somalia, De facto Government of Somaliland, Regional Authorities, Genuine Clan Leaders, Business Community , Religious Leaders6. Partners: Local and regional civil society actors, international organisations, donors
